item.description:
Bring your own Kayak or rent one...

Either way plan for a 3 hour trip down the Westport River. The foliage should be beautiful. We'll paddle down to the Back Eddy Restaurant where my truck will be waiting with my trailer to take us and the kayaks back to the rental place where we all can park. I will need a couple of people to get there early with me to shuttle my truck to the Back Eddy.

If you're renting - it's up to you to make arrangements with Osprey Sea Kayak Adventures. Rates and contact info below.

Rain Date - there is none... you're on the water suck it up... Excessive winds however will cause us to reschedule and we'll figure that out later so pray for good weather.

Bring rain gear - pants included. It will keep you dry.

Bring snacks, water & lunch if you get really hungry... we can eat at the Back Eddy or the brewery... we can figure that out then.

hope to see many of you there.

Osprey Sea Kayak Adventures
489 Old County Rd.
Westport, MA 02790

 http://www.ospreyseakayak.com Email: westport@ospreyseakayak.com
Tel: (508) 636-0300   Half day Full Day Week S.O.T single $25 $40 $200 S.O.T. double $40 $55 $225 Single Kayak $30 $45 $225 Double Kayak $45 $60 $250

 

Your Rental includes lifejacket, paddle and basic instruction.

With advanced reservations, local delivery & pick up may be available for multiple kayak or weekly kayak rentals.

*OSKA staff will determine if your vehicle is appropriate for safely transporting boats.

Our rental boats are not intended for whitewater paddling or open water crossings.

Under 18 requires signature of parent.

Under 16 must be accompanied by an adult.

All rental boats must be returned 1/2hour before closing or you will be charged a late fee.

Group/Party rentals available-Call 508-636-0300 for more information.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Toyota Truck wtih the 16ft utility trailer

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Kayaking on the Westport River
